title: How to monetize my already released music by sending it out to radios - Quora

response.answer_text: You earn money from broadcast of your songs by earning royalties, which are collected by the performing rights organisation, such as PRS for Music in the UK. But it's key you register as a Songwriter with them and if you own the recording, you need to register with PPL. In the states, it's sound exchange and the PROs are ASCAP, BMI and SESAC.
